headline: Accountability tool that puts your money on the line
description:
Show HN: Accountability tool that puts your money on the line

Hi HN!

I built a tool on Optimism (an L2 rollup) on Ethereum that helps help you ACTUALLY stay accountable for your tasks/goals.

Pick an accountability buddy and lock some in the contract.

If you complete the task, you get your money back. If you fail, itâ€™s donated to @khanacademy

More details here: https://twitter.com/amirbolous/status/1520447612234600448?s=20&t=zWi_wLGjIJGX2UDVnK0HQg

https://keepmeaccountable.xyz/ https://github.com/amirgamil/accountable

Tool is completely free to use minus gas fees which should be relatively low (less than $0.5) because this on Optimism!
